name: Heist Meisters (KennySSC_1)
description:
Welcome aboard, you are going to be the best agent of this company. We need your talents to prevent the enemy to use their devasting cannon with anyone! Your mission is to infiltrate in their installations, take their plans and all documents you can take from there.

But becareful, they have a lot of guards and cameras to prevent that.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My first Godot released game, I made a online course, so you will probably see more clones, but belive me, I tried to make it different and worked beyond the course, making art, more tools and a more replayable game. Im proud of the final product.
